alert.note: Alert for Butler; Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 4:17PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ripley and western Butler Counties through 445 PM CST... At 417 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doniphan, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Doniphan around 420 PM CST. Oxly around 425 PM CST. Budapest and Fairdealing around 435 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Milltown, Poplar Bluff and Hendrickson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Missouri.
